description:
I was a huge Lightoom fan but wanted to get away from Windows. I ran dual boot Windows and Linux for a while but really didn't like being forced to keep Windows on my computer for one program so my search for a Lightroom replacement began.

I tried quite a few programs but was not happy with the results. I then came across RawTherapee. I was surprised at the featureset and to be honest, a little intimidated. The workflow was a bit different than I was used to but after watching a few tutorials the program began to make sense. I now am hooked. I am very impressed with just how well I can do post processing of images and no longer feel the need to run back to Lightroom. 

Thank you to all involved in bringing us not only an outstanding program but one that I believe is as good if not better than the paid alternatives.

I use RawTherapee for several years now and it never stopped being the best RAW developer around. If you want full control this is the only program that gives it to you. Your price is a steep learning curve. But it is worth it.
I really like the interface and the feature set, but some of my Adobe DNG files are not interpreted correctly, making it impossible to properly edit them sometimes.
summary: Awesome but need better RAW support

description: The interface looks great, it's easy to understand (once you've used one of the bunch of these lightroom-like UI apps) but needs better support for Adobe DNG files; sometimes they're not interpreted correctly, making it impossible to edit the images as it should.
summary: Awesome but needs better RAW support

description:
Have a corrupt .jpeg, it just skiped it. Gimp error gave "Corrupt JPEG data: premature end of data segment","Unsupported marker type 0x71",
"JPEG image plug-In could not open image". Image Viewer in Fedora can open it but can't fix the file. RawTherape should tell that there is a corrupt file.
The best software to use with raw files

I only used this program for a short while. It looks powerful but I did not enjoy using it for the following reasons:

1. It's easy to push the trash button, but I could not figure out how to empty the trash.
2. Why can't I press multiple filter buttons, for instance "Red" AND "non-trashed"?
3. The vertical, right-hand tab-bar should be against the right window edge.
4. I should be able to select multiple images with the mouse by drawing a box around them, just like in a file manager.
summary: Needs UX refinement to be less frustrating

description: I use it because there is no lightroom for linux and I got everything I need! For free.
In my view it is better than darktable software
Love this app. Handles Fuji RAW files beautifully and has a lot of features. Great stuff

easy.fast.simple to use...best result. 
Its the best
It changes colour without my permission, and there's no button to show the photo's original colour.
summary: Changes colour without asking & Unable to show photos' original colour

description: I prefer this over dark table, because of the look of the UI and the workflow. Not saying it is better but Rawtherepee had what I needed. In Ubuntu 20.04 Beta it does not launch at all, but I am on beta . It worked perfectly in Ubuntu 19.04.
It is now working. I use this over darktable for the clean easy to use UI and the functionality.

Thank you very much for this application on Ubuntu.

On windows is working very hard and my culling system is going crazy. On Ubuntu, on the other hand, is working very slowly.

Thank you very much.
Keep up the good work
Unlike any linux programs, except for blender. This program is well-written with many advanced features that delight photographers. The interface is so advanced and better than ad*be lighroom.
summary: This is what linux software must look like

description: Overall, this is a great program. However, it doesn’t have a spot removal tool. So you’re probably gonna need to use it with another photo editor.
Very comprehensive tool set! Fast UI

i've been using RawTherapee for the last 5 years. This is a mightiest raw editor ever; it includes multiple precise tools allowing to get the best out of one's raw files. The program requires certain learning curve and experimenting rediness and may not be suitable for those who used to consume a semi-digested food.

It's hands down the best RAW converter for Linux. It doesn't catalog like Adobe Lightroom. I believe darktable has a cataloging feature. This is more like Adobe Camera RAW. Once you get the hang of it, you can batch hundreds of RAW files with a few clicks.

Great app its just one lens correction profile is missing in Linux version (Sigma 150 - 600 mm F5 - 6.3 DG OS HSM Contemporary) and it is present in Windows version :(
Also those flowers at the end of tools panel, it seems to me that, they do not fit to the interface - it is a little annoying. 
Otherwise it is just an amazing app!
I really want to express my gratitude to the developers, dedicated to this project, to allow us to receive such a diamond piece of RAW image software. Good job!
loooooooooooooooooove

Exelente aplicacion demasiado completa y sumamente amplia para la fotografia, liviana y comoda, si pudiese ser mas rapida en el proceso de imagen seria mas eficiente, DIOS BENDIGA a sus desarrolladores!
Al lot of features, a lot to learn, but you also get a lot.

I have been using this raw editor for several years. I must admit it has a steep learning curve but it is worth. Allows almost limitless edition for very creative work. Good for implementation of automated raw procession of propietary raw file formats.
summary: Great! Super powerful raw image editor

description: Just tried RawTherapee with my Kodac (yes Kodac) raw files and this program is great. Max control to process pictures. Loads to learn but out of the gate I was able to figure things out quickly. Recomend to all user wlho want control of their raw picture files.

Darktable doesn't now support Canon's CR3 format. So I tried RawTherapee. It opens CR3 files, but seems to not display them correctly – there are rainbow-colored pixels all over the place that don't show up in Lightroom.

RawTherapee might work for your camera's RAW format, but don't try it for .CR3 until they fix this issue.
summary: Opens my .CR3 files, but they just don't look right

description: It will run on your 10 year old dual core thing but a multi core modern CPU will mean less waiting. A must for any interchangable lens camera owner

Sadly with this newer version and Ubuntu 18.04 the HaldClut Film simulations experience a recurring bug. In the drop dow menus the selections are appearing once and then the drop down does not show anything anymore as soon as I hover over it a second time...

I have more than 4 TB of photographs collected in nearly 20 years now. Most of them are RAW. I have them on a NAS, exported by NFS. - Should work "OOB" unter Linux, one should think. - But: nope! - No way! - Nothing is even displayed from a NFS share, even though it is mounted rw. - So, I hate to say it, but this is an absolute showstopper for me. -> Unusable!
summary: Unusable, not working on NFS share

description:
Zig mal besser als wie Darktabel.
Es ist richtig fix bei der Bearbeitung.
Richtig Toll !
ein großes Dankeschön an die Entwikler
Lo uso para procesar los raw de una cámara fuji y funciona perfecto.
se las recomiendo
es buena y maso maso me gusta pero no me arrepiento de haberla instalado se las recomiendo de melina paz chao
summary: no es tan mala la aplicación

description: Cuando viajes, la uso mucho parque es rápida y fácil de usar, los gráficos son muy simples, y eso esta bien porque para la gente que no entiende mucho de gráficos, les será fácil entender estos.
summary: La aplicación es genial; la recomiendo

description: Estoy aprendiendo a usarla me gustaría saber donde puedo acceder a un curso intensivo para aprender a usarlo
como puedo instalar en fedora 33?

Si haces fotografia profesional y si te migraste a de Windows a Linux, es una excelente opcion, venia de utilizar Lightroom y me acople a esta app en seguida, tiene excelentes opciones, sabiendolo manejar, puedes hacer un trabajo extraordinario
me encanta es divrtido y bueno

esta buena la app 
no la entiendo muy bien ahora
ya que empece a usarla
pero la verdad es que es buena para editar y hacer otras cosas ahi
ghrthñhjerrfjnvfgg
I've tried all the available options for Linux and I have to say, this is by far the best one. I can't believe it is free
summary: Best software to edit RAW photos in Linux. Period

description: Une prise en main simple et des outils facile à appréhender. Sans oublier une foule de finesse de réglage utiles et couleur comme en noir et blanc.

ceux qui ne peuvent pas passer sous linux a caus des logiciels adobe , ca finira par changer
avec rawtherapee krita et gimp

RawTherapee est très complet, c'est pour moi le top du traitement de raw. Il ne fait que ça mais le fait très bien, l'exact contraire de beaucoup de logiciels propriétaires qui couvrent la chaîne complète d'une manière imparfaite. A noter qu'on peut appeler The Gimp par l'intermédiaire de Rawtherapee (sans sortir de l'application et sans perdre de la définition) .
On peut l'utiliser même si on est un utilisateur moyen. La documentation RawPedia est quasi parfaite, Elle va très loin mais est utilisable par un débutant.
Enfin une alternative viable à lightroom..

Il manque la possibilité de shooter avec un appareil en mode connecté. Avec live view, recadrage en live view quelques réglages et la superposition en png sur le live view.
Peut être aussi la possibilité de faire du pixel shift en direct, gérer la mise au point etc...
Avec tout ça, ça serait top !
summary: Il manque le mode capture connectée ! Il serait parfait avec ça !

description: Nécessite un temps pour le prendre en main. Mais une fois paramétré, c'est un plaisir de puissance et d'efficacité
Je viens de le télécharger tout le monde m'en dit que du bien. Je vous retiens au courrant....
После перехода под Linux это приложение было первым в качестве редактора RAW фото. Понятный и красивый интерфейс, довольно шустрый
из редакторов RAW с открытым кодом - лучшее
крутое обожаю супер
summary: Крутое приложения для корактировки для ютуба советую

description: Эм, не понял. Установил через флетпак, и когда пытаюсь открыть деректорию с равами вместа реальных деректорий какая то виртуальная фигня и я просто не могу получить доступ к деректории. Только по одному файлу можно открыть через контекстное меню, и открываются они в какомто виртуальном пространстве.
一直在用它处理佳能相机的CR2文档。工具不大，功能不少。
